Brilliant Corona.name: Brilliant Corona
Brilliant Corona.flavor: A blinding corona blazes around your head, dazzling your enemies with punishing light.
Brilliant Corona.onHit: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Brilliant Corona.effect: After the attack, make a melee basic attack against any creature not blinded by the attack as a free action.

Radiant Crusade.name: Radiant Crusade
Radiant Crusade.flavor: There can be no mercy, no hesitation, for the gods have spoken: you must purge the unclean enemy with fire and sword.
Radiant Crusade.target: You and each ally in the burst
Radiant Crusade.effect: The target makes a melee basic attack. If the attack hits, the target deals extra fire and radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier on all melee attacks until the end of the encounter. If the attack misses, the target instead regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Heaven's Warriors.effect:
The burst creates a zone of bright light that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally in the zone can choose one of the following effects:
Deal extra fire and radiant damage on next attack equal to your Charisma modifier + one-half your level.
Gain a bonus to all defenses equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Spend a healing surge and regain extra hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
